value.title: Is Artificial Intelligence Closer to Common Sense?
value.excerpt: Intelligent agents lack the common-sense knowledge they need to reason about the world. Traditionally, there have been two unsuccessful approaches to getting computers to reason about the world—symbolic logic and deep learning.
